participant_1.background:
I am usually pretty shy, but my new job is helping me come out of my shell.
I enjoy video games but I wish I were closer to my family.
i think canadian women are incredibly attractive.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.

participant_2.background:
I love to eat fresh produce from my family's farm, especially after a long hike.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.
I live far from my family, but I love them.
I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.
I am a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students.

content.text: Hi! How has your day been?
Hi! It has been pretty good. I just finished a long hike and am now enjoying some fresh produce from my family's farm.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I love fresh produce. I am usually pretty shy, but my new job is helping me come out of my shell.
That is great! I love to hike, but I am not really a gym person. I go for walks every day with my cats.
That's awesome! I have a dog, but I would love to have a cat too. I live far from my family, but I love them very much.
I live far from my family too, but I love them very much. I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.
That's a really cool way to spend your birthday! I love The Walking Dead too. I am a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students.
That's amazing! I am glad that you have found a career that you love.
Thank you! I am too. It is really rewarding.
